overview: #Mickey is a hybrid documentary about a genderfluid Youtube celebrity from Mexico. Born in 1994 in Mazatlán, Sinaloa, Mickey began recording herself at age 11. She found in social networks a way to explore her gender identity and overcome the deep homophobia of her environment and became a Youtube sensation with more than 250 thousand online followers.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

title: #Mickey
